comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Double whammy; I'm back, too. I've been out w/ family stuff, but it's all settled down now and I'm dying to roll. Thanks to Steve for letting me tank the Frenzy for as long as I did. Good thing he got back while there was still a pulse; another week and it would have expired... just one more Potemkin-village of a blog, all tempera and veneer, no life, no blood, no free T-shirts. See ya' at noon! DU
